title: 能不能用execute指令检测玩家行走
txt_content: 1.8.9 或 1.10.2 以上的能不能用execute指令检测玩家行走

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
2508466234 发表于 2019-9-14 11:22
emmmm，我没了解过sb指令
1.14.4 

/scoreboard objectives add walk minecraft.custom:minecraft.walk_one_cm

/execute as @e[scores={walk=1..}] run scoreboard players set @s walk 0 
/execute as @e[scores={walk=1..}]  run say 动了

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 xmdhs 于 2019-9-14 11:25 编辑 

用记分板，使用准则minecraft.custom:minecraft.walk_one_cm

然后再检测分数增大就行了

xmdhs 发表于 2019-9-14 11:20
用记分板，使用判据 minecraft.custom:minecraft.walk_one_cm

然后再检测分数增大就行了 ...
emmmm，我没了解过sb指令
